_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Actions with grass, sticks, branches, an: Carry off the grass, sticks, branches, and leaves in Jeta's Grove
Do what they want with them
The consequences of giving up what isn't: Giving up the eye will be for your welfare and happiness
Giving up the ear will be for your welfare and happiness
Giving up the nose will be for your welfare and happiness
Giving up the tongue will be for your welfare and happiness
Giving up the body will be for your welfare and happiness
Giving up the mind will be for your welfare and happiness
